title: About Facts for Life
content:
Every family and community has a right to raise healthy children. 

Facts for Life is a handbook of essential information to protect and save children’s lives.  

Full of practical advice on childhood illnesses, child development, and, parenting; Facts for Life is a useful guide for mothers, fathers, and other caregivers to get children off to a healthy start in life.

The messages in Facts for Life are based on the latest scientific findings by medical and child development experts around the world. 

Facts for Life is a trusted resource, helping families and communities around the world, since 1989.
